mapper.select: select round(avg(replace(hd.dealAmount,',','')),-3) as dealAmount, round(avg(hd.area),2) as area, max(hd.floor) as floor, hd.aptCode, tmp.lat, tmp.lng, tmp.apartmentName, tmp.address,tmp.housecomment,tmp.jibun,tmp.buildYear from housedeal hd inner join (SELECT hi.aptCode, hi.apartmentName, concat(sidoName,' ',gugunName,' ',dong,' ',roadName,' ',jibun) address, lng, lat, hi.housecomment, jibun, buildYear FROM houseinfo hi INNER JOIN dongcode dc ON hi.dongCode = dc.dongCode) tmp on hd.aptCode = tmp.aptCode group by hd.aptCode;

select round(avg(replace(hd.dealAmount,',','')),-3) as dealAmount, round(avg(hd.area),2) as area, max(hd.floor) as floor, hd.aptCode, tmp.lat, tmp.lng, tmp.apartmentName, tmp.address,tmp.jibun,tmp.buildYear from housedeal hd inner join (SELECT hi.aptCode, hi.apartmentName, concat(sidoName,' ',gugunName,' ',dong,' ',roadName,' ',jibun) address, lng, lat,jibun,buildyear FROM houseinfo hi INNER JOIN dongcode dc ON hi.dongCode = dc.dongCode WHERE hi.dongcode = #{dongCode}) tmp on hd.aptCode = tmp.aptCode group by hd.aptCode;

select round(avg(replace(hd.dealAmount,',','')),-3) as dealAmount, round(avg(hd.area),2) as area, max(hd.floor) as floor, hd.aptCode, tmp.lat, tmp.lng, tmp.apartmentName, tmp.address,tmp.jibun,tmp.buildYear from housedeal hd inner join (SELECT hi.aptCode, hi.apartmentName, concat(sidoName,' ',gugunName,' ',dong,' ',roadName,' ',jibun) address, lng, lat,jibun,buildyear FROM houseinfo hi INNER JOIN dongcode dc ON hi.dongCode = dc.dongCode WHERE dc.dongName like concat('%',#{dong},'%')) tmp on hd.aptCode = tmp.aptCode group by hd.aptCode;

(select no as aptcode, dong as dong_name, aptname as apt_name, buildyear as buildYear, jibun, lat, lng from houseinfo where aptname like concat(#{aptName}, '%')) union all (select no as house_no, dong as dong_name, aptname as apt_name, buildyear as buildYear, jibun, lat, lng from houseinfo where dong like concat(#{dongName}, '%'))
